subject: Looking for sponsor.
description_text:
Hi Sir. My name is Juan Figueroa. im 28 years old and im currently driving
for VSR Competicion ( https://x.com/VsrCompeticion ). we are going to race
the next season of the VSCA Championship ( https://x.com/vscaracing )  Im
currently having issues with my current pedals (some fanatec csl basic
models) and im looking for some sponsor due to recently move to norway and
not having a job yet for be able to purchase your pedals( i will need just
the brake and gas pedals, i dont use clutch)  , this is a personaly ask, my
team as nothing to do with it. I have the plan of starting a project in
tiktok and instagram for make clips of the championship like overtakes,
intentse battles, team training sessions, saves and anything that could be
interesting for different espectators. i let you my current only video on
tiktok just in case you want to check it out (
https://www.tiktok.com/@nessutto74/video/7579289230481067266).
My social media ( https://x.com/Nessutto74)
My twitch couse on i stream the special events in iRacing (
https://www.twitch.tv/nessutto74 )
My iRacing name  Juan Figueroa Correa ( currently in 2.691 iRating and
going up quite fast couse im taking it more competitive , last week on IMSA
at SPA racing with LMP2 +547)
My most kind regards Juan Figueroa.
